ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisReappointment of ANDREW TEPPERMAN of LaSalle, Ontario, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of Ontario - West and South, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on July 1, 2023.
